name: Faber-Castell Graphite Sketch Pencil Set - 6 Graphite Pencils (2H, HB, B, 2B, 4B, 6B), Drawing Pencils and Sketching Supplies
short_description: VERSATILE GRAPHITE PENCILS - Faber-Castell graphite pencils are a diverse and versatile tool for artists and beginners alike! The ergonomic, hexagonal shape and smooth graphite is ideal for sketching, graphic design, and shading.

SKETCHING PENCIL SET - Includes 6 artist quality Faber-Castell graphite pencils in various degrees of lead hardness: 2H, HB, B, 2B, 4B, 6B. Made of finely ground graphite and clay, Faber pencils provide a smooth and balanced laydown for superior performance
BREAK-RESISTANT LEAD - Faber-Castell graphite pencils feature a break-resistant lead that is glued the entire length of the pencil to ensure limitless drawing and easy sharpening

MADE FROM REFORESTED WOOD - Faber-Castell graphite pencils are proudly manufactured with carbon neutral production and using reforested wood grown from FSC certified sustainable forestry. The CO2 emissions caused by the manufacturing process of this item are neutralized by certified projects.

QUALITY SKETCHING SUPPLIES - Since 1761, Faber-Castell has proudly created art and school supplies for kids, adults and professional artists alike. Faber-Castell Sketch Pencil Set provides durable, flexible, and quality drawing supplies for the art student and aspiring artist
product_description: Bring your ideas from pencil to paper with Faber-Castell Graphite Pencils! Write, draw and sketch with versatile graphite leads ideal for adding detail, shading and writing. The Faber-Castell Graphite Sketch Pencil Set is ideal for the aspiring artist and art student. This artist quality graphite pencil set provides versatile and diverse drawing pencils that are ideal for sketching, graphic design, shading, urban sketching, mixed media art, dimension art and portraits. This is a complete sketching pencil set that includes 6 Faber-Castell graphite sketching pencils. Faber-Castell graphite pencils feature pre-sharpened, break-resistant leads that are glued the entire length of the pencil to ensure the lead will not fall out during use or sharpening. The break-resistant lead is a mixture of finely ground graphite and clay to ensure a smooth, balanced and easy laydown, perfect for shading! The graphite pencils are available in 6 degrees of hardness: 2H, HB, B, 2B, 4B, 6B. Since 1761, Faber-Castell has proudly created art and school supplies for kids, adults and professional artists alike. Elevate your skill and work by using the flexible and durable Faber-Castell graphite pencils that are ideal for the art student and aspiring artist.

short_description: Value Set: The package contains 24 black HB wooden pencils, enough to meet the needs of various locations. Ideal for schools, offices, and homes to maintain daily pencil consumption.
Pre-sharpened Pencils: Each pencil is pre-sharpened, saving you time and effort. Ready to use straight out of the box, made from high-quality wood that is easy to clean and sharpen.

Smooth Writing and Erasing: The standard HB pencil features a durable, break-resistant lead, offering smooth writing and clear marks, perfect for extended writing and sketching. It won't smudge and is easy to erase, making it great for daily use.

Ergonomic Pencil Design: The hexagonal design of the pencil provides a comfortable, secure grip and prevents rolling. Additionally, each pencil is equipped with a soft eraser at the end, which is durable and allows for easy erasing of pencil marks.

Wide Range of Uses: These pencils are non-toxic and acid-free, safe for both children and adults. They are widely used for daily writing, sketching, drawing, exams, engineering drawings, and more, making them especially suitable for children, teenagers, and adults in classrooms and at home.

product_description: With a rich heritage, and origins dating back to 1795, the Dixon Ticonderoga Company throughout history has made its mark through quality, integrity, respect and perseverance. Today Dixon Ticonderoga continues to make its mark manufacturing and marketing writing instruments, art supplies and tools for self expression. The Ticonderoga is the world's best pencil. Satin smooth finish enhances writing comfort. An exclusive graphite core formula gives you extra smooth performance. PMA certified non-toxic and crafted with premium wood from well managed forests, these top quality pencils feature latex-free erasers to provide easy, clean corrections. The finish contains Microban protection to inhibit the growth of odor and stain causing bacteria on the pencil. More than a writing and art products company, Dixon Ticonderoga empowers people to take conscious and subliminal thoughts, facts, ideas and dreams, and preserve them using tools that are simply extensions of themselves.
